title: PES
content:
Hey... 
I Have A Query.. How Much It Gonna Cost For Non Karnataka Student For 4 years  complete B Tech CSE In PES University With Certain Scholarship

comments.body: Somewhere around 12.5 lakhs if u get mrd scholarship, 14 lakhs if you get cnr scholarship and 20 lakhs if you don't any scholarship (this is only for the tuition fee)

Dude if a person gets into pes through kcet 
What will the fees be? 
And if one can avail scholarships what will the cost be?
5.2l if you want scholarship and 4.8l without scholarship benefits
But one should not join assuming they will get a scholarship every sem.
That is what he assumed in the question

Am Just In Dilemma Yrr... Can't Figure Out... How To Get Good College... i Got 90 percentile in my jee and am not sure about 2nd attempt... And I Want A Good College with decent placement... and Fees Shouldn't be high than 11_12 lakhs

The scholarship is like a lottery. You pay the 10k  for 1 year to be eligible, and if you get it you get 30k per sem. 

So even getting it in one sem is worth it. But if not you're down 1pk
Wait do we have to pay 10k every year for scholarship??

A clg with less than 12L fees is bit tough with that percentile,even if u get VIT or MIT by clearing their entrance exam the fees would exceed 12L . i would suggest you to give Comedk exam , you might get some good pvt clgs of Bengaluru, tho the fees is a bit higher than 12L fs but you'll atleast get a somewhat decent clg
Give kcet if your eligible... it's the only option for low fees...
